solution.text:
\(Dividend = Divisor \times Quotient + Remainder\)
Therefore,
Dividend = \((x+_{j}_)(x-_{j}_) + _{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Dividend = \(x^2 - _{j}_^2 + _{k}_\) (Using identity \((a+b)(a-b) = a^2 – b^2\))
\(\Rightarrow\) Dividend = \(x^2 - _{{(j**2) - k}}_\)

content.text: If divisor \(= x + _{j}_\), quotient \(= x - _{j}_\), remainder \(= _{k}_\), find the dividend.
